程序包 cn.wuqinxuan.numbercruncher.mathutils

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    Evaluatable
    Interface implement by function classes.
    IEEE754Constants
    Constants related to the IEEE 754 standard.
    Integrator
    Interface implemented by integrator classes.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AlignRight
    Print text and numbers right-aligned in columns.
    BigFunctions
    Several useful BigDecimal mathematical functions.
    BisectionRootFinder
    The root finder class that implements the bisection algorithm.
    Complex
    Perform basic complex arithmetic.
    DataPoint
    A data point for interpolation and regression.
    DiffEqSolver
    The base class for differential equation solvers.
    DifferentialEquation
    The base class for functions that can have derivatives.
    Epsilon
    Compute the machine epsilon for the float and double types, the largest positive floating-point value that, when added to 1, results in a value equal to 1 due to roundoff.
    EulersDiffEqSolver
    Differential equation solver that implements Euler's algorithm.
    FixedPointRootFinder
    The root finder class that implements the fixed-point iteration algorithm.
    Function
    The base class for functions that can have derivatives.
    IEEE754
    Decompose a floating-point value into its parts according to the IEEE 754 standard.
    IEEE754.DoubleFraction
    The IEEE 754 fraction part for a double.
    IEEE754.FloatFraction
    The IEEE 754 fraction part for a float.
    ImprovedRegulaFalsiRootFinder
    The root finder class that implements the improved regula falsi algorithm.
    InterpolationPolynomial
    A polynomial interpolation function.
    IntPower
    Raise a double value to an integer power.
    KahanSummation
    Implement Kahan's Summation Algorithm for the float type.
    ModuloArithmetic
    Perform multiplication and exponentiation modulo arithmetic.
    NewtonsRootFinder
    The root finder class that implements Newton's algorithm.
    PredictorCorrectorDiffEqSolver
    Differential equation solver that implements a predictor-corrector algorithm.
    PrimeFactors
    Compute the Sieve of Eratosthenes and prime factors.
    RandomExponential
    Utility class that generates exponentially-distributed random values using several algorithms.
    RandomNormal
    Utility class that generates normally-distributed random values using several algorithms.
    RegressionLine
    A least-squares regression line function.
    RegressionPolynomial
    A least-squares regression polynomial function.
    RegulaFalsiRootFinder
    The root finder class that implements the regula falsi algorithm.
    RootFinder
    Abstract base class for the root finder classes.
    RungeKuttaDiffEqSolver
    Differential equation solver that implements a fourth-order Runge-Kutta algorithm.
    SecantRootFinder
    The root finder class that implements the secant algorithm.
    SimpsonsIntegrator
    Function integrator that implements Simpson's algorithm with parabolas.
    TrapezoidalIntegrator
    Function integrator that implements the trapezoidal algorithm.
  • 异常错误概要 
    异常错误 说明
    IEEE754.Exception
    IEEE 754 exception.
